Beta-eshopping Chrome Extension

Shop from your favourite UK and US Stores and pay in Naira. 

With the beta-eshopping extension, you can shop multiple UK and US websites, checkout in one cart, and get affordable delivery costs on beta-eshopping website.

How it works: 

1 . Shop the supported UK and US websites on the extension by clicking on the 'Browse stores' menu. 

2 . Select the store of your choice from the dropdown list. 

3. Add items to the store cart and click on 'Checkout' button on the beta-eshopping's extension tab.
